text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium boreae is a fungus species of the genus Penicillium.
text.Further reading: Peterson, Stephen W.; Sigler, Lynne (September 2002). "Four new Penicillium species having Thysanophora-like melanized conidiophores" (PDF). Mycol. Res. 106 (9): 1109–18. doi:10.1017/S0953756202006433.
